name: Trela
headline: Your one-stop shop to eat well in Brazil
description:
Trela is the consumer app with the highest NPS in Brazil and the grocer with the highest NPS worldwide — 91.

Our mission is to help people eat better. We are curating the highest-quality food and beverage products in Brazil and implementing a just-in-time supply chain that maximizes freshness and minimizes waste of everything we sell. At Trela, you will find a one-stop shop for healthy groceries in São Paulo, all delivered to your doorstep at the most competitive prices.

We are fortunate to work with some of the leading technology investors in Latin America and the world, including SoftBank, Kaszek, General Catalyst and Y Combinator.

founders.name: Guilherme Nazareth de Souza, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of Trela. Loves traveling to exotic cities, reading about economic history, and Barry's Bootcamp.

founders.name: João Jönk, Founder
founders.description: Brazilian, design lover but not a designer, into consumer businesses and brands. I enjoy podcasts, running, wine, yoga, skiing, traveling.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Trela**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, Trela is a rising star in Brazil's online grocery space, specifically based in São Paulo. The company aims to be a one-stop shop for customers who prioritize healthy eating—hence their mission: "Your one-stop shop to eat well in Brazil."

Trela stands out with a remarkable Net Promoter Score (NPS) of 91, making it the top-rated consumer app in Brazil and the best-rated grocery platform worldwide. This is no small feat, and it highlights the company's commitment to customer satisfaction.

**What They Do:**

Trela curates a diverse range of high-quality food and beverage products. They have implemented a just-in-time supply chain strategy that focuses on maximizing freshness and minimizing waste. This commitment ensures that customers receive the best products right at their doorstep, all at competitive prices. They offer a wide selection from fruits and vegetables to dairy, meats, baked goods, and even snacks—essentially everything you need for a balanced diet.

**Team and Support:**

With a team of 120 dedicated employees, Trela has garnered the support of significant investors like SoftBank, Kaszek, General Catalyst, and Y Combinator, which provides the company with strong backing as it scales. The leadership includes notable names such as Dalton Caldwell, serving as their Group Partner.

**Why It Matters:**

In a country where food choices significantly impact health outcomes, Trela is making waves by promoting healthier options and reducing food waste. Its innovative approach combines technology and a focus on customer experience, creating a shopping journey that resonates deeply with health-conscious consumers.

**Explore More:**

You can discover more about Trela and browse their offerings by visiting their official website: [Trela](https://www.trela.com.br).

With their impressive trajectory and mission-driven approach, Trela isn't just a grocery app; it's part of a broader movement toward better eating habits in Brazil, one delivery at a time.
